```{r}


fruitflies <- read_csv("fruitflies.csv")
```

```{r}

### Set year to an ordered factor
fruitflies$condition <- factor(
x = fruitflies$condition,
levels = c("Null", "One Pregnant", "One Virgin","Eight Pregnant","Eight Virgin")
)
```
